value:
I spent some time traveling with a kid
who was studying elder magic. He
had a gift for it that I've never had...

Dark magic, elder magic... No matter
what you call it, it just never clicked
for me. Anima, on the other hand...

My nana always said my old man had
a knack for elder magic. Oh, but most
people know it as dark magic, huh?

If you ever need some coin, let me
know—I do a bit of lending on the
side. It's good money too.

Hmm... How about here? Or maybe
over—hey, who's there?! ...Oh, it's
only you, $Nu.$k$pDon't mind me, I'm just looking for a
place to lie low for a while.

Uh... Hi! It may look like I'm sneaking
around, but I was actually sent here
by your friend. Yes, really!

Hahaha! How do you like that, huh?
Don't worry—there's plenty more
where that came from!

Clear a path, or face the wrath of this
dashingly handsome and eminently
talented mage!

This can't be happening... My poor,
delicate heart has been pierced clean
through! Please, remember me...

Don't you worry—I'm going to put in
work that's worth every coin, and
then some!

In need of a mage, friend? I'm a lot
stronger than I look, and I daresay
you'll find my rate quite reasonable.

My nana is a master of elder magic,
so she expected me to follow in her
footsteps. But...that didn't work out.$k$pAnd then I met an orphan who could
wield dark magic so...easily. Like it
just came naturally to him.$k$pSeeing that made me question my
own ancestry. I hail from a family of
dark mages, so why couldn't I use it?$k$pAccording to my nana, though, my
aptitude for anima magic comes from
my mother. Learning that was...nice.$k$pOh, do you have a master of your
own? You don't seem like you're
from around here either...$k$pHmm... Almost like you've been
set adrift, forever wandering...$k$pAh, it's nothing. You just reminded
me of myself, that's all. Guess we've
all got our own path to follow, eh?
よっ
おらっ
ぎゃあっ
いっ痛え！
We won't meet again.
No thank you!
This might smart a bit.
My lucky day.
You've gotta be kidding me...
Heheheh.
You need a mage? You got one! The name's Hugh.
Whoa, hey! You after my money?
"Sir"? Did you call me "sir"? That's like a knife in my tender young heart...
I tried to study elder magic. For the life of me, I couldn't figure it out.
One, two, three... What? I have to make sure the gold's all here.
My nana always called me a fool. Me, her own grandson! Can you believe that?
I know you have a tough job, but there's no need to look so serious. Lighten up!
Yep!
Seriously?
Sneaky sneaky.
